Posts.Content: No, that is the wonderful part after a bilateral mastectomy, never having to have a mammogram again. MRI or the PEM scan is the only tests needed for follow up and some doctors do not even want to do that. I however, will be insisting because if it returns, I want it found early. Simple mastectomies that are done today do not take all breast tissue as past radical mastectomies. Good Luck.
Posts.Title: Mammogram after bilat mast?

Posts.Content: My microcalcifications were followed every 6 mo for 3 years and then I told them I wanted a biopsy. Early Stage 1 ductal carcinoma. I wonder how long they would of kept stating probably benign on my report?
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications

Posts.Content: Have her see her internist or rheumatologist. I developed costochondritis. That is what it sounds like.
Posts.Title: Pain in my ribs after masectomy. Help?
